scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run abaplint
scripts.merge.ci: cp zabapgit.abap ci/zabapgit_standalone.prog.abap && cd ci && abaplint --format codeframe && cd ..
scripts.build: rm -rf output && abap_transpile test/abap_transpile.json && cp -f src/ui/zabapgit_icon_font.w3mi.data.woff output/
scripts.unit: npm run build && echo RUNNING && node output/index.mjs --skip-critical
scripts.coverage: npm run unit && c8 node output/index.mjs --skip-critical && c8 report --reporter=html
scripts.integration: npm run build && echo RUNNING && node output/index.mjs --only-critical
